content: materials to make one placemat you will need purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organically grown cotton yarn each skein of this sport-weight yarn is 279 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 1 skein approximately 240 yards required - contrast color cc 1 skein approximately 34 yards required you ll also need - a size e 3 5 mm crochet hook 2 making a set one skein of cc will make up to 8 placemats just be sure to pick up a skein of mc for every placemat you plan to crochet or switch the mc and cc for a set of 2 placemats using only 2 skeins we used the following colors for our set of 6 samples… - mc heirloom white cc peach peony for one and cc mineral blue for the other - mc alabaster cream cc waterdrop blue for one and cc honey yellow for the other - mc warm rock cc pink smoke for one and cc coastal blue for the other gauge rounds 1 5 in pattern = 4 inches diameter size finished diameter 14 inches designed by purl soho designer whitney van nes 3 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-crochet_hooks html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/whitney-van-nes-for-purl-soho/
